|rad1chip2 = Texas Instruments;; |rad1chip3 = |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is using TNETW1130 (TNETW1130GVF) via the Mini PCI ( / [[wikipedia:VLYNQ|VLYNQ]] ?) slot on the board. ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Stock firmware=== ===di-624+_revb_2.06b30_nml.bin (rev. B FW)=== '''MD5: '''2d0bfdd6ee51b020e03b48c6d6d8d77a
File sourced from ftp://ftp.dlink.eu/Products/di/di-624plus/archive/driver_software/DI-624+_fw_revB_206b30_ALL_en_040924.zip
The firmware is an ARJ archive - it extracts to NML.MEM. The '''Global Sun''' HW platform ID in the file includes '''WLRT2454-XT0-B10'''.
The OS within the file would appear to be '''Express Logic''''s '''ThreadX''' G4.0.4.0. :The version string is '''Copyright (c) 1996-2001 Express Logic Inc. * ThreadX JADE/Green Hills Version G4.0.4.0'''. [[Category:English Documentation]]
